text: Jo log tujh say bait kertay hain woh yaqeenan Allah say bait kertay hain, unkay hathon per Allah ka hath hai, to jo shaks ehad shikni keray woh apnay nafs per hi ehad shikni kerta hai aur jo shaks iss iqrar ko poora keray jo uss ney Allah kay sath kiya hai to ussay unqareeb Allah boht bara ajar deyga
